function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of public transportation without proper health protocols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of daily health screening and assessment may lead to undetected covid-19 cases in the offshore workplace.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on lower sensitivity testing methods may result in missed covid-19 cases, allowing infected individuals to enter the workplace.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to covid-19 during travel to the workplace via public transportation modes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of periodic medical check-ups mcus to assess and monitor worker health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on a hierarchy of controls for covid-19 prevention with challenges in elimination","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ppe for workers based on their specific risks, leading to insufficient protection from covid-19 exposure","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited facilities for self-quarantine and self-isolation, leading to challenges in preventing covid-19 transmission among workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in ensuring workers’ compliance with health protocols during self-quarantine","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of handwashing facilities with soap and alcohol-based hand rub","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in offshore facilities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of administrative controls to minimize exposure to sars-cov-2","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to eliminate or substitute covid-19 from the offshore workplace","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to establish physical barriers and directions to control worker traffic in narrow areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to conduct a self-health evaluation and implement preventive measures for workers in shared vehicles increases the risk of covid-19 transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of efficient contact tracing measures for workers in shared vehicles can lead to difficulties in identifying close contacts in case of a confirmed covid-19 case.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Incomplete compliance with medical check-up requirements","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient adherence to covid-19 prevention guidelines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in the workplace due to close contact and contact with contaminated surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High person on board pob density in offshore platforms leading to increased risk of covid-19 outbreak","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on productivity and industries due to worker illness and absenteeism","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Coronavirus transmission through contaminated surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sustaining time of coronavirus on different metal surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High concentration of inorganic compounds for disinfection","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparative study of virus behavior on different surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High viral load and asymptomatic carriers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Efficacy of disinfectants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of infective organisms on metal surfaces and in aerosols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced infectivity of covid-19 virus in aerosols over time","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of various chemical substances in sanitisers and disinfectants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Coronavirus sustainability on various surfaces, leading to potential transmission through touch.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hidden transmission of the virus by carriers who are unaware of their infection status.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness and limitations of disinfectants in eliminating microorganisms on various surfaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Origin of sars-cov from bats and transmission through intermediate sources like palm civets","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Violation of ecosystem due to large human population gathering and intervention","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission of sars-cov-2 leading to the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of ai to diagnose covid-19 symptoms and pneumonia","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile remote presence systems for medical consultations","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The use of iot, drones, robots, and wearable devices can lead to privacy and data security risks, as personal health information may be compromised.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on cloud computing and big data analytics for outbreak prediction and tracking may lead to data breaches and unauthorized access to sensitive information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of digital technologies may lead to privacy and data security risks in handling personal health information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on digital platforms may lead to issues of digital divide, limiting access to healthcare assistance for certain populations.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Interoperability challenges may arise when integrating multiple digital technologies used for covid-19 mitigation, leading to data silos and reduced efficiency.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to the collection and storage of personal information by mobile apps.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on people’s willingness to embrace new technology and digital infrastructure for successful implementation of digital communication tracing and tracking.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with data regulation laws such as hipaa and gdpr","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of strategy to handle downtime in cloud computing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Latency in real-time diagnosis and data processing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Security risk of cloud computing in healthcare data storage","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of trust in government relief funds for covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
